name: Laffy Taffy Rope Blue Raspberry (22g)
desc:
The Classic Wonka's Laffy Taffy Blue Raspberry Rope is rich in fruity flavour and is sure to make your mouths water! The Chewy texture gives it that everlasting flavour and is sure to keep you snacking on it all day.
Each one is formed into the shape of a Blue Raspberry flavoured rope with a joke on every wrapper, unwrap some fun whilst you munch your way through. They're full of flavour and fun, you're sure to have some giggles along the way with this sweet treat.
Laffy Taffy is created by the Wonka group and is imported from the USA.

name: Dr Pepper Cotton Candy (88g)
desc: The sweet taste of Dr Pepper... in the form of Cotton Candy!? YES PLEASE! Savour all 23 flavours of the famously secret formula as the fluffy sugary treat dissolves in your mouth... is your mouth watering yet?

name: Jolly Rancher Hard Candy Original Bag (198g)
desc:
Jolly Rancher Hard Candy Original Bag are an American classic for all ages. Each bag is filled with the fruity flavours of: Grape, Cherry, Blue Raspberry, Green Apple and Watermelon.
Each candy is wrapped individually and bursting with flavour, perfect for on the go or for sharing with friends.
Imported from the USA and made by The Hershey Company.

name: Jolly Rancher FILLED Lollipop (15g) - Single
desc: Crunchy outside and a chewy gooey centre, this lolly is certain to pop you into a good mood. You will be randomly selected one of the following flavour combinations, Watermelon + Green Apple, Cherry + Grape, Green Apple + Cherry, Grape + Watermelon. I think you’ll agree, they all sound amazing.

name: Sour Patch Kids Peg Bag Blue Raspberry (141g)
desc: Sour Patch Blue Raspberry is here!! Voted as America's favourite Sour Patch colour, this Limited Edition Sour Patch Peg Bag contains JUST BLUE! Sour then sweet and bursting with flavour!

name: Laffy Taffy Rope Cherry (22g)
desc: The Classic Wonka's Laffy Taffy Rope is rich in fruity flavours and is sure to make your mouths water! The Chewy texture gives it that everlasting cherry flavour and is sure to keep you snacking on it all day. Each one is formed into the shape of a cherry flavoured rope with a joke on every wrapper, unwrap some fun whilst you munch your way through. They're full of flavour and fun, you're sure to have some giggles along the way with this sweet treat. Laffy Taffy is created by the Wonka group and is imported from the USA.

desc: The Classic Wonka's Laffy Taffy Strawberry Rope is rich in fruity flavour and is sure to make your mouths water! name: Airheads Bar Cherry (15g)
desc:
Airheads Bar Cherry are tangy, taffy-like chew bars exploding with flavour. This cherry bar, packs some serious fruity flavour…who knew a sweet treat could taste this refreshing? This bar will have your mouth watering after every bite.
Each bar is perfect for those summer picnics and packed lunch boxes. Each bar is individually wrapped, so don’t feel like you have to share.
Airheads are imported from the USA and are made by Perfetti Van Melle.

name: Nerds Rope Very Berry (26g)
desc:
Nerds Rope Very Berry is a tasty rope, packed with crunchy, sweet Nerds! They’re crunchy on the outside with a soft and chewy centre. Each bite will leave an explosion of flavour in your mouths! The Nerds Rope Very Berry is one of America’s favourites.
The wild berry Nerds coat a deliciously sweet and stretchy gummy rope to create a tangy crunch, it’s sure to be the crunchiest rope you’ll eat. The Nerds Rope Very Berry will always leave you wanting more!
The Nerds Rope Very Berry is made by Nestlé and imported from the USA.

name: Airheads Bar Grape (15g)
desc:
Airheads Bar Grape are tangy, taffy-like chew bars exploding with flavour. This grape bar, packs some serious fruity flavour…who knew a sweet treat could taste this refreshing? This bar will have your mouth watering after every bite.
Each bar is perfect for those summer picnics and packed lunch boxes. Each bar is individually wrapped, so don’t feel like you have to share.
Airheads are imported from the USA and are made by Perfetti Van Melle.

name: Airheads Bar Green Apple (15g)
desc:
Airheads Bar Green Apple is a classic taffy with a kick! Each bar is blasted with intense fruity Green Apple flavours that will leave you wanting more.
It's a soft taffy, chewy bar full of flavour. This bar will fill your mouth with a Green Apple blast...it's the ideal treat size bar so you won't have to share!
Airheads is imported from the USA and made by Perfetti Van Melle.

name: Airheads 6 Bar Selection Theatre Box (93g)
desc:
Airheads 6 Bar Selection Theatre Box contains 6 fruity flavours: watermelon, grape, cherry, orange, blueberry and the mystery flavour bar. Inside is 6 individually wrapped hard chewy candy bars. Each bar is bursting with fruity flavours.
Why miss out on trying all the flavours when you can get them all with this theatre box! The perfect sized movie snack for all the family. Share them or don't...that's up to you!
Airheads are imported from the USA and made by Perfetti Van Melle.

desc:

name: Swedish Fish Theatre Box Red (88g)
desc:
Swedish Fish Theatre Box Red are the original’s, they’re an American fan favourite and we know why...all those amazing berry flavours. The Swedish Fish Red is the original flavour and it doesn’t disappoint, it combines flavours of cherry, blackcurrant and fruit punch all in one fish shaped sweet treat.
Swedish fish have a soft but chewy texture and are fat free, so even better. They’re full of fruity flavour and fun and one for all the family to share, especially with this theatre box.
Swedish Fish are imported from the USA and are made by Cadbury Adams.

name: Laffy Taffy Rope Banana (22g)
desc:
The Classic Wonka's Laffy Taffy Banana Rope is rich in fruity flavour and is sure to make your mouths water! The Chewy texture gives it that everlasting flavour and is sure to keep you snacking on it all day.
Each one is formed into the shape of a Banana flavoured rope with a joke on every wrapper, unwrap some fun whilst you munch your way through. They're full of flavour and fun, you're sure to have some giggles along the way with this sweet treat.
Laffy Taffy is created by the Wonka group and is imported from the USA.

name: Jolly Rancher Blue Raspberry Peg Bag (198g)
desc: What's your favourite Jolly Rancher flavour? Blue Raspberry? Of course it is, it's a well known fact that anything Blue Raspberry flavoured is going to taste UNREAL! So here it is, a bag full of Blue Raspberry flavoured Jolly Ranchers... you're welcome.

name: Jolly Rancher Assorted Share Bag (396g)
desc:
Jolly Rancher Assorted Share Bag contains hard candies in a range of assorted flavours. A sharing bag of individually wrapped Jolly Rancher hard candies that taste of delicious fruity flavours: Blue Raspberry, Green Apple, Cherry, Grape and Watermelon.
This bag is the perfect size for sharing or handing out at those kids parties or just for kicking back on the sofa watching tv. Jolly Rancher has got you covered.
Jolly Rancher is imported from the USA and is made by The Hershey Company.

name: Sour Patch Kids Theatre Box Extreme (99g)
desc:
Sour Patch Kids Extreme Theatre Box contains 4 EXTRA tangy flavours: strawberry, pear, orange and blue raspberry. Each Sour Patch Kid is a deliciously soft and chewy sour candy perfect for kids and grown ups.
They're colourful and lip-puckeringly sour and then sweet, they have an extra sour sugar coating to make them that much tangier.
Sour Patch Kids are imported from the USA and made by Mondelez International.

name: Sour Patch Kids Theatre Box (99g)
desc:
Sour Patch Kids Theatre Box contains 5 extremely classic flavours: Lemon, Lime, Orange, Cherry and Raspberry. Each Sour Patch Kid is a deliciously soft and chewy candy, perfect for kids and grown ups.
They're colourful and deliciously fruity, they have a sugar coating to make them tangier. One of America's favourite candies.
Sour Patch Kids are imported from the USA and made by Mondelez International.

name: Sour Patch Kids Theatre Box Watermelon (99g)
desc:
Sour Patch Kids Watermelon Theatre Box contains sour, watermelon shaped and flavoured candy. Each Watermelon is a deliciously soft and chewy sour candy, perfect for kids and grown ups too.
They are colourful and lip-puckeringly sour until they turn sweet. Each box is full to the brim with little watermelon shaped and flavoured delights that will make your day. The theatre box is just the right size for sharing.
Sour Patch Kids are imported from the USA and made by Mondelez International.

name: Twizzlers Strawberry Twist Peg Bag (198g) (BB Expiring June 2022)
desc:
BUY ONE GET ONE FREE!! Add one bag to your cart and another will be automatically added for FREE!!!
Twizzlers Strawberry Twist Peg Bag's are the classic red liquorice sweet, they're an American family favourite. They're packed with strawberry flavour and are low in fat, you can see why they're a favourite.
Twizzlers Strawberry Twist's come in a variety of shapes and sizes, they'll be sure to get your tongue in a twist if you're not careful. This Peg Bag will keep you going throughout your day, its the perfect pocket sized snack.
Twizzlers are imported from the USA and are made by The Hershey Company.

name: Laffy Taffy Rope Mystery Swirl (22g)
desc:
The Classic Wonka's Laffy Taffy Mystery Rope is rich in fruity flavour and is sure to make your mouths water! The only way to discover the flavour of this chewy, tangy, stretchy, colourful candy rope is by taking a bite! The Chewy texture gives it that everlasting flavour and is sure to keep you snacking on it all day.
Each one is formed into the shape of a flavoured rope with a joke on every wrapper, unwrap some fun whilst you munch your way through. They're full of flavour and fun, you're sure to have some giggles along the way with this sweet treat.
Laffy Taffy is created by the Wonka group and is imported from the USA.

desc:
Mike and Ike Mega Mix Theatre Box is filled to the brim with 10 fruity flavours: Caribbean Punch, Strawberry-Banana, Paradise Punch, Grape Soda, Kiwi Banana, Mango Delight, Watermelon, Pineapple Banana, Peach Berry, and Blue Raspberry. Every box lets you enjoy soft and chewy goodness, with big flavour.
The perfectly flavoured bite sized candy packs a big punch of flavour. Mike and Ike's Theatre Box's are the perfect size for sharing. Sometimes you just can't beat the classics.
Mike and Ike's are imported from the USA and made by Just Born.

The Swedish Fish Assorted doesn't disappoint, with even more juicy, fruity flavours than before. Swedish fish have a soft but chewy texture and are fat free, so even better. They're full of fruity flavour and fun and one for all the family to share, especially with this theatre box.

desc:
Jolly Rancher Gummies candy is the ultimate variation of a classic. These soft, chewy gummies are full of so many fruity flavours; Grape, Cherry, Green Apple, Orange, Watermelon and Lemon. They're shaped just like fruit, and they pack some serious fruit flavour into every bite.
With this theatre box, you can enjoy these sweet treats anytime and anywhere.
Jolly Rancher is imported from the USA and is made by The Hershey Company.

The perfectly flavoured bite sized candy packs a big punch of flavour. Mike and Ike's Theatre Box's are the perfect size for sharing. Sometimes you just can't beat the classics.

desc:
Jolly Rancher Fruit Chews Box have the divine fruity flavours of the classic original Jolly Rancher Hard Candies but without all that crunch. Each box of fruit chews contains four deliciously fruity flavours: Green Apple, Watermelon, Cherry and Blue Raspberry.
This box of Jolly Rancher Fruit Chews is the perfect pocket companion to keep you going whilst you're out and about.
Jolly Rancher is imported from the USA and is made by The Hershey Company.

name: Nerds Rainbow Theatre Box (141g)
desc:
Nerds Rainbow Theatre boxes contain tiny, tangy, crunchy candy's in an assortment of flavours: strawberry, grape, orange and lemonade. These rainbow coloured treats will rattle your brains when the flavours don't match with the rainbow of colours.
Nerds theatre boxes are the perfect pocket size snack for not just those cinema trips but so much more. These candy treats are a rainbow of both flavours and colours and are perfect for sharing...or not, that's up to you.
Nerds Rainbow Theatre Boxes are created by Nestlé and imported from the USA where they are one of the ultimate candy choices of all times.

name: Mike and Ike Theatre Box Mega Mix Sour (141g)
desc:
Mike and Ike Mega Mix Sour Theatre Box is filled to the brim with 10 super sour flavours: Apple, Cherry, Lime, Pineapple, Grape, Strawberry, Lemon, Punch, Watermelon and Raspberry. Every box lets you enjoy soft and chewy goodness, with big flavour.

Each box contains a mouth-watering duo of flavours and all within these tiny pieces of candy. This pocket sized box of little fruity pebbles lets you enjoy them on the go.

name: Mike and Ike Theatre Box Cotton Candy (141g)
desc:
Mike and Ike There Box Cotton Candy have been a family favourite for decades, with each box packing intense flavour! These soft, chewy candies are bursting with that sweet taste of cotton candy...they're sure to bring back those childhood memories.
This theatre box is perfect for sharing over a movie with friends or family.
Mike and Ike are imported from the USA and are made by Just Born.

name: Charleston Chew Bar Vanilla (53g)
desc:
Charleston Chew Vanilla Bar is a classic retro bar and the original nougat candy for America. Each bar has a soft, chewy, vanilla nougat centre which is coated in rich, creamy chocolate.
Each bar packs a whole lot of history it's perfect for all adults and kids. Have it how it is, or pop it in the freezer for the ultimate chill-out session!
Charleston Chew is imported from the USA and is made by Fox-Cross Candy Company.

name: Warheads Extreme Sour Hard Candy (28g)
desc:
Warheads Extreme Sour Hard Candy Mini's are extremely sour, hard candy mini's in 6 delicious flavours. It's where the name Warheads comes from, their explosively sour flavours: Black Cherry, Apple, Lemon, Watermelon and Blue Raspberry.
These Hard Candy Mini's will be sure to bring out your sour side as they burst with flavour. They create fun for all the family. The perfect amount to fix your sugar cravings.
Warheads are imported from the USA and are made by Impact Confections.

name: Sour Punch Straws Blue Raspberry (56g)
desc:
Sour Punch Blue Raspberry Straws will be sure to satisfy your sweet and sour cravings all at once. Sip your favourite drinks through this Blue Raspberry straw for an energising sweet and sour taste.
Each Blue Raspberry Straw is coated in sour sugar, giving it that tangy-sweet combination with a soft and chewy texture…perfect for those movie nights. Punch up your taste buds.
Sour Punch Straws are imported from the USA and are made by the American Licorice Company.

desc: M&M White Chocolate is an undeniably tasty combination of flavours. Each pack contains a solid centre of creamy white chocolate before its coated in a crunchy candy shell in all sorts of fun rainbow colours. They're guaranteed to melt in your mouth and not in your hands! The perfect cinema treats to keep you going. M&M's are imported from the USA and are made by Mars Inc. Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: M&M’s Bite Size Cookies (45g)
desc:
M&M's in a chocolate chip cookie? Sounds like a dream! Luckily for you, it isn't! Keebler have brought to us Bite Sized M&M Cookies with Chocolate Chips, enjoy on their own, or they are perfect dunked in a cup of tea!
Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: KitKat Blueberry Muffin (42g)
desc: BRAND NEW FLAVOUR!! KitKat Blueberry Muffin is the latest release that the world is going crazy for! Take a break with a delicious tasting chocolate wafer bar that genuinely tastes exactly like Blueberry Muffins! We're rating this pretty high amongst the other flavours that KitKat have released, it's definitely one to try out!

name: M&M's Peanut Butter (46g)
desc: M&M Peanut Butter are the undeniably tasty combination of flavours. Each pack contains real peanut butter surrounded by a creamy milk chocolate and then coated in a crunch candy shell in all sorts of fun rainbow colours. They're guaranteed to melt in your mouth and not in your hands! The perfect cinema treat to keep you going. M&M's are imported from the USA and are made by Mars Inc. Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: M&M's Fudge Brownie (40g)
desc:
Imagine the lush, gooey flavour of homemade chocolate brownies, then mix that with the iconic and unbeatable taste of M&M's - seems too good to be true right?
Well, it's very much real and ready for you to buy! M&M Fudge Brownies are incredibly popular, so get them whilst you can, you wouldn't want to miss out on this flavour sensation would you?!
Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: Reese's Pieces Theatre Box (113g)
desc: Reese's Pieces Theatre Box combines their classic Reese's peanut butter filling with a new bite-sized treat. Each box contains tiny colourful candy shells filled with deliciously sweet and salty peanut butter. Reese's peanut butter is unmistakable! This theatre box is perfect for sharing or for keeping all to yourself. Reese's is imported from the USA and is made by The Hershey Company. Also known as Reeses, Reeces and Reece's.

name: Snickers Peanut Brownie (34g)
desc: Just landed from the States; NEW: Snickers Peanut Brownie is a delicious mix of nutty brownie goodness topped with caramel and nuts - cover all of that in chocolate and you've got a match made in Snickers heaven. Limited availability!

name: Milk Duds Theatre Box (141g)
desc:
Milk Duds are sweet and chewy balls of caramel-coated In creamy milk chocolate. Don't be fooled by their size as they pack some serious flavour of caramel, honeycomb and chocolate into every single 'dud'.
This theatre box is perfect for snacking on whilst you're watching your movie but don't expect there to be any left by the end!
Milk Duds are imported from the USA and are made by Hershey.

name: M&M's Caramel (40g)
desc: M&M Caramel is an undeniably tasty combination of flavours. Each pack contains a sticky caramel before it's coated in a crunchy candy shell in all sorts of fun rainbow colours. They're guaranteed to melt in your mouth and not in your hands! The perfect cinema treats to keep you going. M&M's are imported from the USA and are made by Mars Inc. Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: Twix Cookies and Creme Bar (39g)
desc:
Twix Cookies and Cream Bar is the perfect snack to satisfy those sugar cravings. Each bar is sure to please with a cream-filled centre, crunchy cookie base before being coated and topped with rich milk chocolate.
This bar is the perfect snack to keep you going, as Twix say, "try both". It's got it all...Twix never disappoints!
Twix is imported from the USA and is made by Mars, Incorporated.

name: Cookie Dough Birthday Cake Bites (87g)
desc:
Cookie Dough Birthday Cake Bites are delicious birthday cake flavoured candy balls, coated in frosting and topped off with multi-coloured sprinkles! Each one is a crunchy ball of candy as yummy as the next, it's hard to just have one.
Birthday Cake Bites are coated in a creamy frosting with the homemade goodness of a birthday cake on the inside, they're totally egg free and delicious to eat. They taste just like a birthday cake!
Cookie Dough Bites are imported from the USA and made by the Taste of Nature, Inc.

name: Twix Salted Caramel (46g)
desc: Popular American Chocolate

name: Tootsie Roll Bar
desc:
A Tootsie Roll Bar is an American classic of the ages. It has been around and enjoyed since 1896. Tootsie Roll is a soft, chewy low-fat candy that offers the perfect balance of cocoa taste underlined with hints of fruit flavour.
All the flavours you could ask for in one bar. This long-lasting, chewable candy still has the same recipe as the original.
Tootsie Roll is imported from the USA and is made by Tootsie Roll Industries.

name: Babyruth Bar (53.8g)
desc:
Babyruth Bar is a hearty American candy bar classic. Each bar contains a soft and fudge chocolate infused nougat centre topped with a sticky layer of caramel and loaded with peanuts before it is coated in a rich creamy milk chocolate.
It's bursting with the perfect combination of delicious flavours. The perfect snack to keep you going.
Babyruth is imported from the USA and is made by Ferrara Candy Company.

name: M&M's Peanut Butter Peg Bag (145g)
desc: M&M Peanut Butter Peg Bag are the undeniably tasty combination of flavours. Each pack contains real peanut butter surrounded by a creamy milk chocolate and then coated in a crunch candy shell in all sorts of fun rainbow colours. They're guaranteed to melt in your mouth and not in your hands! The perfect cinema treat to keep you going. M&M's are imported from the USA and are made by Mars Inc. Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: Cookie Dough Chocolate Chip Bites (87g)
desc:
Cookie Dough Chocolate Chip Bites are little bite-sized pieces of cookie dough covered in a creamy milk chocolate. They are crunchy balls of candy, each one is as yummy as the next.
Cookie Dough Bites are coated in a rich chocolatey treat with the homemade goodness of cookies on the inside, they're totally egg free and delicious to eat. Perfect for cookie dough lovers.
Cookie Dough Bites are imported from the USA and made by the Taste of Nature, Inc.

name: Butterfinger Bar (59g)
desc:
Butterfinger Bar is a crispy, crunchy peanut buttered flavoured treat. Each bar has a peanut honeycomb centre which is coated in silky smooth chocolate. This soft bar has a crumbly consistency giving it that perfect mouth-watering recipe.
This bar is the perfect snack to keep you going through those long days.
Butterfinger Bar is imported from the USA and is made by Ferrara Candy Company.

name: Charleston Chew Bar Vanilla (53g)
desc:
Charleston Chew Vanilla Bar is a classic retro bar and the original nougat candy for America. Each bar has a soft, chewy, vanilla nougat centre which is coated in rich, creamy chocolate.
Each bar packs a whole lot of history it's perfect for all adults and kids. Have it how it is, or pop it in the freezer for the ultimate chill-out session!
Charleston Chew is imported from the USA and is made by Fox-Cross Candy Company.

name: Milky Way Midnight Dark Bar (46g)
desc:
Milkyway Midnight Dark Bar is the ultimate way to indulge your dark side. You can't go wrong with the ultimate combination of rich dark chocolate, gooey golden caramel and soft vanilla nougat. Each bar has all this filling and is coated in delicious dark chocolate.
This bar is a tasty way to add tasty fun to any celebrations. The perfect bar to give you your sugar fix when the going gets tough.
Milkyway is imported from the USA and is made by the Mars company.

name: Cookie Dough Fudge Brownie Bites (87g)
desc: Popular American Chocolate

name: KitKat Duo's Strawberry and Dark Chocolate (42g)
desc:
The most decadent Duo's flavour yet, KitKat Duo's Strawberry and Dark Chocolate Bar, is a two-toned treat with two flavours practically made for each other! Each bar features crisp wafers blanketed in pink strawberry flavoured creme and a rich dark chocolate. This new treat mimics chocolate covered strawberries in the most delicious way, both dark chocolate and strawberry envelop those classic crispy wafers to create a taste sensation that will indulge your taste buds with the most luxurious of flavours!
Strawberry is known to be a sweet flavour, and for some that can be just a little too sweet for them, but trust us, mixed with the decadent flavour of dark chocolate, the two powerful flavours balance out to create the perfect 'not-too-sweet' combination, and trust us, it's definitely worth a try! Straight from America, these NEW imported KitKat's will be a staple when you are looking for that perfect chocolatey snack! The new release will be a core addition to their ever expanding Duo's range, so don't panic! This delicious new flavour won't be going anywhere any time soon, we promise! Delve into the delicious taste for an evening treat, or simply dive in on your lunch break!
While the classic tag line has encouraged people to 'Take a Break' since 1935, this little taste of sweetness with the delicious taste of dark chocolate and strawberry encasing a crispy wafer will make millions of people smile endlessly, KitKat has definitely delivered with their new Duo's flavour, as with every flavour they release. The KitKat Duo's Strawberry and Dark Chocolate Bar is the perfect alternative to a dessert, simply rip through the packaging and snap the bar to get the taste of chocolate covered strawberries without the fuss! Dive right in and get the sweet, decadent and luxurious taste of the new Duo's flavour with the trusted and well loved taste of KitKat.

name: Pop Tarts Grocery Pack Frosted Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough (399g)
desc:
Despite the popularity of chocolate chip cookies, there are many that appreciate the taste of cookie dough just as much. The alluring taste of cookie dough can now be enjoyed in a Pop Tart, thanks to the introduction of Frosted Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough.
The terrific taste of cookie dough is captured in the filling, while a delicious chocolate frosting delivers a tremendous taste that can be enjoyed as a snack any time of the day, and is perfect with a glass of milk.
Pop Tarts are imported from the USA and are made by Kellogg's.

name: Milky Way Fudge Share Size Bar (85g)
desc:
Milkyway Fudge Share Bar is the ultimate way to indulge your sweet side. You can't go wrong with the ultimate combination of creamy milk chocolate, gooey golden caramel and soft fudge nougat. Each bar has all this filling and is coated in delicious milk chocolate.
This bar is a tasty way to add tasty fun to any celebration. The perfect bar to give you your sugar fix when the going gets tough.
Milkyway is imported from the USA and is made by the Mars company.

name: Reese's Dipped Pretzels (120g)
desc:
Reese's Dipped Pretzels make snacking that much tastier! Each bag contains Snyder's Pretzels drizzled in Reese's creamy peanut butter candy and drizzled with rich milk chocolate. They're the perfect balance of sweet and salty!
Snacking just got a whole lot better when these sweet and salty flavours collided in this mouth-watering Reese's Dipped Pretzels bag.
Reese's is imported from the USA and is made by The Hershey Company.
Also known as Reeses, Reeces and Reece's.

name: M&M's Caramel Share Size (80g)
desc: Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: KitKat Duos Mint and Dark Chocolate Bar (42g)
desc:
KitKat Duos Mint and Dark Chocolate Bar have taken the familiar classic crispy wafer and dipped it into decadent, rich dark chocolate on the bottom half and a refreshing mint creme on the top. This bar brings a whole new level of chocolate heaven.
A swing on the classic, but the motto remains the same, take a break and have a KitKat. It's the perfect break-time snack!
KitKat is imported from the USA and is made by Nestle.

name: Cookie Dough Red Velvet Cupcake Bites (87g)
desc:
Cookie Dough Red Velvet Cupcake Bites are delicious bite-sized cupcake pieces in a creamy red velvet coating. They are crunchy balls of candy, each one is as yummy as the next, it's hard to just have one.
Red Velvet Cupcake Bites are coated in a creamy red velvet icing with the homemade goodness of red velvet cake on the inside, they're totally egg free and delicious to eat. They taste just like red velvet cake!
Cookie Dough Bites are imported from the USA and made by the Taste of Nature, Inc.

name: Pop Tarts Twin Pack Frosted Chocolate Chip (96g)
desc:
The fantastic tasting Pop Tarts Frosted Chocolate Chip can also be experienced in a smaller form factor, courtesy of the Pop Tarts Frosted Chocolate Chip Twin Pack. It still has all the flavour you're looking for from the original!
Don't worry no flavour has been sacrificed in these smaller twin packs they're just easier to have on the go and perfect for pack lunch boxes!
Pop Tarts are imported from the USA and are made by Kellogg's.

name: M&M's Peanut Butter Theatre Box (85g)
desc: M&M's Peanut Butter Theatre Box is an undeniably tasty combination of flavours. Each pack contains a centre of creamy peanut butter before its coated in rich milk chocolate and in a crunchy candy shell in all sorts of fun rainbow colours. They’re guaranteed to melt in your mouth and not in your hands! The perfect cinema treats to keep you going. M&M’s are imported from the USA and are made by Mars Inc. Also known as M and M's, MandM's, M & M's, M+M's, M and Ms, MandMs M & Ms M+Ms

name: Hershey's Sprinkles 'N' Creme Bar (39g)

name: Reese's Sticks Bar (42g)
desc:
Reese's Stick Bars are a variation of the classic Reese's cups. Each stick has layers of everything you could've dreamed of. Reese's creamy peanut butter can be found in-between each layer of light and crispy wafer to give it that munch with a crunch effect before it is smothered in a layer of rich milk chocolate.
Who doesn't love a chocolate and peanut butter combination?
Reese's are imported from the USA and are made by The Hershey Company.
Also known as Reeses, Reeces and Reece's.

name: Pop Tarts Grocery Pack Frosted Cookies and Creme (396g)
desc:
Black and white cookies have taken the world by storm, and Kellogg's has released its own variant of the popular flavour in the guide of Pop Tarts Frosted Cookies and Crème.
The pastry contains a fabulous cookies and crème flavour, while the frosting contains cookie crumbles for the ultimate black and white cookie experience in the form of a Pop Tart.

This bar gives you the best way to eat your cookies and cream. Will you be sharing?

It's the perfect snack to keep you going at work, feel free to share, but don't feel you have to...we understand they're too yummy.

desc: Reese's White Peanut Butter Cups are a new twist on the absolute classic taste of Reese's Cup original. Each can will leave you wanting more, it's America's favourite soda! It's perfect for that Summer season!

Each can will leave you wanting more, it's America's favourite soda! Take a sip of deliciousness this Summer.

desc:
Dr Pepper Cherry Vanilla is a carbonated soft drink with cherry and vanilla flavouring, it has the unique taste of the Dr Pepper USA but with a sweet cherry twist and the richness of vanilla all combined under one can.
Each can will leave you wanting more, it’s America’s favourite soda! Each can is made with that original mix of 23 flavours making it taste that much nicer!

desc:
There is nothing more frustrating than searching for a drink flavour that does not seem to exist. Grape lovers in the United Kingdom have been searching high and low for a delicious beverage that offers all the good taste of grapes, to no avail, until now, thanks to Arizona drinks.
As the name implies, the Arizona Grapeade Fruit Juice Can is the perfect tonic for those wanting to quench their thirst while enjoying the finest taste that grapes can offer.
Arizona Grapeade is manufactured from natural juices and contains vitamin C and is a drink directly from the USA that the whole family can enjoy.

However, many prefer the refreshing taste of peaches in a liquid form, which can be found with the Arizona Iced Tea with Peach.
Arizona Iced Tea is a testament as to how much choice there is regarding great-tasting tea blended with stunning fruit flavours and is the ideal substitute for those wanting to cut down on energy drinks.
